name: Entrupy
overview:
Entrupy is built with the vision of leading the fight against counterfeit products across the globe.

We uniquely identify and authenticate any physical object. We are like DNA authenticators of physical objects.

We use our patented PaperSpeckle authentication technology to uniquely identify and authenticate physical objects/surfaces.

PaperSpeckle uses microscopic imaging hardware and complex algorithms to identify the unique nature of every single object/surface, therefore creating a proof of authenticity for objects. It’s concept is based on how ambient light scatters at a microscopic level on a surface, which allows you to read its unique characteristics. The concept is similar to that of DNA or DNA-based identification, which in this case, would be unique to each and every object in this world. Objects/Surfaces that can currently be fingerprinted include paper, canvas, wood, metal, fabric and plastic.
